resources.string:
Developer: David Asensio (@dasensio13) 
Game Designer: Uwe Rosenberg 
Year Published: 2012 
BGG: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/119890/agricola-all-creatures-big-and-small 

Version 0.1 - 02/11/2012 
* Beta Development phase 
* Future options: 
	- Better expansion points introduction 
	- Better building points introduction 
	- Better design for info and credits

* Yo can change player names by selecting them. 
* You must calculate the buildings and expansion points manually. 
* You must click on CALCULATE to update extra points, total and winner.
